data.title: Lok Sabha election 2024 dates in Uttar Pradesh announced, voting in 7 phases
data.meta_description: Lok Sabha election 2024 in Uttar Pradesh will be held across seven phases from April 19 to June 1 and the counting of votes will take place on June 4.
data.text:
Lok Sabha election 2024 in Uttar Pradesh will be held in seven phases from April 19 to June 1, announced the Election Commission of India (ECI) on Saturday. Votes polled in the seven phases of Uttar Pradesh Lok Sabha election 2024 will be counted on June 4 and the Uttar Pradesh Lok Sabha election 2024 results will also be declared the same day, June 4, the EC said.

Phase 1 voting will be held on April 19, Phase 2 voting will be held on April 26, Phase 3 voting will be held on May 7, Phase 4 voting will be held on May 13, Phase 5 voting will be on May 20, Phase 6 voting will take place on May 25 and Phase 7 voting will be held on June 1.

Phase 3 voting: May 7

Phase 7 voting: June 1

Lok Sabha elections 2024: Full schedule

The 2024 Lok Sabha elections will be held in seven phases beginning April 19 and ending on June 1. The counting of votes will be held on June 4.

The BJP had won 303 seats in the previous elections while the Congress remained the Opposition ranks with a mere 52 seats. It could not muster enough numbers to claim the position of Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha.
